wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Hunter McCooke (4 September 1918 – 16 March 2007) was a British long-distance runner. He competed in the men's 10,000 metres at the 1948 Summer Olympics.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1948 Summer Olympics
Athletics at the 1948 Summer Olympics – Men's 10,000 metres

response: Steve McCooke (born 31 January 1960) is an Australian former cricketer. He played three first-class cricket matches for Victoria in 1994.
